overview:
Julian is a pragmatic technology and product strategist with international experience spanning startups and Global 100 companies.

Formerly Founder and CTO of Filobite, Julian started out building Derivatives Trading Systems at Deutsche Bank and at HBS startup, ZEFER, he led key strategy and implementation projects for clients such as Charles Schwab and Wells Fargo in addition to multiple startups.

Julian holds a Masters in Engineering from Cambridge University and is a Chartered Engineer.
